body_html:
This is the benchmark.

Also, the ldd output on one of our servers:

$ ldd torch/lib/libTH.so.1 
    linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00007ffeb1fc9000)
    libmkl_intel_lp64.so => not found
    libmkl_intel_thread.so => not found
    libmkl_core.so => not found
    libiomp5.so => not found
    libpthread.so.0 => /lib64/libpthread.so.0 (0x00007fd6795fb000)
    libm.so.6 => /lib64/libm.so.6 (0x00007fd6792f9000)
    librt.so.1 => /lib64/librt.so.1 (0x00007fd6790f1000)
    libgomp.so.1 => /lib64/libgomp.so.1 (0x00007fd678ed9000)
    libc.so.6 => /lib64/libc.so.6 (0x00007fd678b17000)
    /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x00007fd679dcf000)

And some results:
@761d679:

$ python mp_benchmark.py 
No of agents (processes): 3
Time: 10.104 seconds.

latest:

[tberariu@gtx-titan4 tensor-benchmarks]$ python mp_benchmark.py 
No of agents (processes): 3
Time: 27.228 seconds.

latest:

[tberariu@gtx-titan4 tensor-benchmarks]$ OMP_NUM_THREADS=1 python mp_benchmark.py
No of agents (processes): 3
Time: 15.864 seconds.

body:
This is the [benchmark](https://github.com/bit-ml/tensor-benchmarks/blob/master/mp_benchmark.py).

Also, the `ldd` output on one of our servers:
```
$ ldd torch/lib/libTH.so.1 
    linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00007ffeb1fc9000)
    libmkl_intel_lp64.so => not found
    libmkl_intel_thread.so => not found
    libmkl_core.so => not found
    libiomp5.so => not found
    libpthread.so.0 => /lib64/libpthread.so.0 (0x00007fd6795fb000)
    libm.so.6 => /lib64/libm.so.6 (0x00007fd6792f9000)
    librt.so.1 => /lib64/librt.so.1 (0x00007fd6790f1000)
    libgomp.so.1 => /lib64/libgomp.so.1 (0x00007fd678ed9000)
    libc.so.6 => /lib64/libc.so.6 (0x00007fd678b17000)
    /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x00007fd679dcf000)
```

And some results:
@761d679:
```
$ python mp_benchmark.py 
No of agents (processes): 3
Time: 10.104 seconds.
```
latest:
```
[tberariu@gtx-titan4 tensor-benchmarks]$ python mp_benchmark.py 
No of agents (processes): 3
Time: 27.228 seconds.
```
latest:
```
[tberariu@gtx-titan4 tensor-benchmarks]$ OMP_NUM_THREADS=1 python mp_benchmark.py
No of agents (processes): 3
Time: 15.864 seconds.
```
